articles.author: Vikki Blake
articles.title: Epic Games refers Apple to the European Commission, after dispute over button design - Eurogamer
articles.description: Update, Saturday 6th July: Epic Games has updated its statement to confirm that Apple has now accepted its submission. …
articles.content:
Update, Saturday 6th July: Epic Games has updated its statement to confirm that Apple has now accepted its submission.
In a brief addendum, Epic said: "Update: Apple has informed us that our previou… [+3363 chars]
